summary: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana|Yami Gautam|Annu Kapoor|Dolly Ahluwalia|John Abraham|Tarun Bali|Siddharth Bhardwaj|Krishna Singh Bisht|Jayanta Das|Aaditrie Dipika|Swaroopa Ghosh|Kamlesh Gill|Puja Gupta|Vijay Meenu|Bhupesh Pandya|Inder Pal Singh
title: Vicky Donor
